alert.note: Alert for Sierra (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 17 at 4:23PM MDT until September 17 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MDT FOR WEST CENTRAL SIERRA COUNTY... At 422 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles east of Hermosa, and is slowly drifting southeast over remote country. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hermosa, Ladder Ranch, Lower Palomas Canyon, and Portions of the Aldo Leopold Wilderness. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
